Detailed Description

Used for the Grid only, columns can have client events specified for them that can have javascript written for them. Each of the events defined in this class is for javascript code snippents.

The grid control exposes a ColumnClientEvents via its ColumnEvents property which is used as the default for every column in the grid unless overridden by the ClientEvents property exposed by every column as well. When you want to use the same javascript for the same event for every column in the grid, define the javascript on the ClientEvents property of the grid itself.

When you want to handle events for a specific column of the grid only, use the ClientEvent property of the individual column.
